requirement_tested: Display basketball match data with real-time updates
user_persona: A sports enthusiast who wants to keep track of live games.
user_goal: To view real-time updates of ongoing basketball matches.

narrative_steps.title: Visiting Homepage
narrative_steps.description: Jordan visits the homepage and looks for the latest match information.
narrative_steps.action: Load the homepage.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A section with upcoming, ongoing, and recently completed matches appears in a card-based layout.

narrative_steps.title: Observing Live Match Card
narrative_steps.description: Jordan notices a match card showing a game currently in progress and clicks it for more details.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a live match card.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The card expands to reveal quarter-by-quarter scores and referee information.

requirement_tested: Provide interactive data visualizations for team and player statistics
user_persona: A fantasy basketball manager analyzing player performance.
user_goal: To compare player stats using interactive charts.

narrative_steps.title: Navigating to Player Stats Section
narrative_steps.description: Alex goes to the player statistics page and sees various chart options available.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the player statistics tab.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Tabbed interface with line charts, bar graphs, and pie charts representing different stats is displayed.

narrative_steps.title: Interacting with Chart Data Points
narrative_steps.description: Alex hovers over a data point on the chart to get precise values and cross-reference them.
narrative_steps.action: Hover over a data point on the chart.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Tooltip displays exact numerical value and highlights corresponding data points across linked visualizations.

requirement_tested: Show match history and past performance trends
user_persona: A coach researching opponent teams before an important game.
user_goal: To review historical match records and performance trends.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Historical Matches Timeline
narrative_steps.description: Coach Taylor scrolls through a timeline of past matches involving the opposing team.
narrative_steps.action: Scroll down the match history timeline.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: More entries load dynamically without requiring a page reload.

narrative_steps.title: Examining Detailed Match Report
narrative_steps.description: Taylor clicks on a specific match from the history to see detailed statistics and plays.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a historical match entry.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A modal window opens showing the full box score and play-by-play breakdown.

requirement_tested: Display current team rankings and standings
user_persona: A basketball fan checking playoff chances for his favorite team.
user_goal: To find where his favorite team stands in the league.

narrative_steps.title: Visiting Team Rankings Page
narrative_steps.description: Mike navigates to the team rankings section to check his team’s position.
narrative_steps.action: Go to the team rankings page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Two-column layout showing Eastern and Western Conference rankings is displayed.

narrative_steps.title: Exploring Deeper Analytics
narrative_steps.description: Mike clicks on his team's name in the rankings to see more in-depth analytics.
narrative_steps.action: Click on his favorite team in the ranking list.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Redirected to the team’s dedicated profile page with deeper analytics.

requirement_tested: Present detailed player performance metrics and analytics
user_persona: A scout evaluating potential draft picks.
user_goal: To analyze a player's strengths compared to league averages.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Player Profile
narrative_steps.description: The scout selects a player profile to assess detailed metrics and visual comparisons.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to a specific player’s profile.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Player headshot, basic info, and a statistical radar chart comparing strengths vs league averages are shown.

narrative_steps.title: Filtering Performance Metrics
narrative_steps.description: The scout taps on a stat category to focus on specific aspects of the player’s performance.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a stat category filter.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Displayed data adjusts accordingly and radar chart axes update to reflect selected metric.

requirement_tested: Generate match predictions based on historical data and trends
user_persona: A casual viewer curious about upcoming match outcomes.
user_goal: To see which team is favored to win in an upcoming match.

narrative_steps.title: Checking Prediction Section
narrative_steps.description: Jamie browses the predictions section to see forecasts for upcoming games.
narrative_steps.action: Visit the match predictions section.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: List of upcoming fixtures with AI-generated probabilities for each outcome is displayed.

narrative_steps.title: Reviewing Prediction Factors
narrative_steps.description: Jamie clicks on a prediction to understand why a certain team is favored.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a predicted match result.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Underlying factors such as recent form and head-to-head records are revealed.

requirement_tested: Offer personalized betting recommendations and insights
user_persona: An experienced bettor looking for smart wager opportunities.
user_goal: To discover personalized betting suggestions based on his preferences.

narrative_steps.title: Browsing Betting Recommendations Feed
narrative_steps.description: Derek logs in and checks his personalized betting feed for new opportunities.
narrative_steps.action: Access the personalized betting recommendations feed.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Feed shows categorized wagers by safety level and estimated ROI with match details and best odds.

narrative_steps.title: Adding Recommendation to Watchlist
narrative_steps.description: Derek finds an interesting bet and decides to track it for changes in odds.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a betting recommendation.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Option to add the bet to watchlist and set alerts for line movements becomes available.

requirement_tested: Include a dashboard overview of key basketball statistics
user_persona: A daily visitor wanting a snapshot of essential stats.
user_goal: To quickly glance at today’s most relevant basketball stats.

narrative_steps.title: Loading Dashboard Overview
narrative_steps.description: Sarah opens the website and immediately views her customized dashboard.
narrative_steps.action: Open the dashboard page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Modular widgets including live scoreboard, top performers leaderboard, and prediction accuracy tracker appear.

narrative_steps.title: Expanding Widget Details
narrative_steps.description: Sarah wants more detail on one of the widgets and clicks its header.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a widget header.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Widget expands to show detailed inspection view.

requirement_tested: Enable users to filter data by teams, players, dates and leagues
user_persona: A researcher compiling data for a study.
user_goal: To narrow down large datasets to only relevant information.

narrative_steps.title: Using Filter Controls
narrative_steps.description: Emma uses the filter controls to isolate data from a specific team during a particular period.
narrative_steps.action: Select filters for team and date range then click 'Apply Filters'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Dataset refreshes to show only filtered results while maintaining scroll position.

narrative_steps.title: Resetting Filters
narrative_steps.description: After reviewing, Emma resets the filters to see all data again.
narrative_steps.action: Click the reset button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Filters clear and default view is restored.

requirement_tested: Provide comparison tools for team vs team and player vs player analysis
user_persona: A fantasy league participant preparing lineup decisions.
user_goal: To determine which player performs better against a given opponent.

narrative_steps.title: Initiating Comparison Tool
narrative_steps.description: Chris accesses the comparison tool to pit two players against each other.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the comparison tool and select two players.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Split-screen interface shows both players’ stats side-by-side with matching categories.

narrative_steps.title: Analyzing Differences Visually
narrative_steps.description: Chris clicks on a stat row to highlight differences numerically and visually.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a comparison row.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Row highlights differences through bar length or shading intensity.

requirement_tested: Display odds information from multiple betting providers
user_persona: A sharp bettor hunting for the best lines.
user_goal: To compare odds across various bookmakers before placing a bet.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Odds Listings
narrative_steps.description: Riley checks the odds listings for a specific match to identify value bets.
narrative_steps.action: Visit the odds listings section for a selected match.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Table format displays latest odds offered by various bookmakers for that match.

narrative_steps.title: Placing Bet via Best Odds Provider
narrative_steps.description: Riley clicks on the best available odds to go directly to the bookmaker’s site.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a specific odd entry.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Redirected to the associated bookmaker’s site to place the bet.

requirement_tested: Show injury reports and roster changes affecting predictions
user_persona: A fantasy owner adjusting lineups due to breaking news.
user_goal: To stay informed about impactful roster moves and injuries.

narrative_steps.title: Reading Injury Reports
narrative_steps.description: Tyler scans the injury report section to adjust his fantasy lineup accordingly.
narrative_steps.action: Visit the injury reports section.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: List of injured players with descriptions, impact severity, and expected return timelines is displayed.

narrative_steps.title: Understanding Impact of Roster Change
narrative_steps.description: Tyler clicks on a recent roster move to see how it might affect upcoming matchups.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a roster change entry.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Pop-up summarizes how the transaction affects team projections and betting lines.

requirement_tested: Include a search functionality for specific teams, players or matches
user_persona: A newcomer trying to learn about star players.
user_goal: To quickly locate information about a famous athlete.

narrative_steps.title: Using Search Bar
narrative_steps.description: Maya types a well-known player’s name into the search bar to find their profile.
narrative_steps.action: Type keywords into the search bar.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Auto-suggested dropdown menu updates in real-time beneath the input box.

narrative_steps.title: Navigating to Player Profile
narrative_steps.description: Maya clicks on the suggested player name to visit their detailed profile page.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a search suggestion.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Redirected directly to the player’s profile page.

requirement_tested: Implement user authentication for personalized experiences
user_persona: A returning user seeking saved settings and customizations.
user_goal: To log in and regain access to personalized features.

narrative_steps.title: Signing In
narrative_steps.description: Alex returns to the site and clicks the sign-in link to access his account.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Sign In' link in the navigation bar.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: OAuth flow initiates and redirects to the secure authentication portal.

narrative_steps.title: Regaining Personalized Experience
narrative_steps.description: After logging in, Alex sees his personalized dashboard and preferences restored.
narrative_steps.action: Complete successful login process.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: User-specific dashboard modules populate and session tokens are saved securely.

requirement_tested: Maintain a clean interface with ghost white background and slate gray components
user_goal: To ensure the site adheres to the defined visual style guide.

narrative_steps.title: Inspecting Background Color
narrative_steps.description: Designer Morgan inspects the overall look of the site to verify adherence to the color scheme.
narrative_steps.action: Observe the background color of the main pages.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Background is consistently rendered in ghost white (#F8F8FF).

narrative_steps.title: Verifying Component Styling
narrative_steps.description: Morgan examines interactive and static components to confirm they use the correct accent color.
narrative_steps.action: Check styling of cards, buttons, and text elements.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: All components utilize slate gray (#708090) as specified.
